src_original: eva rājadhānīm (MSV I 35)  āgatya prātarāśikam akārṣīt* /
tgt_original: 既周遍已，是轉輪王還至本宮，乃進小食。 以是因緣，彼王爾時內心自慶，歡喜踊躍：

src_original: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 『為我故，生如此象寶。 』諸比丘！ 轉輪聖王，有如是等白色象寶，自然具足。 「諸比丘！

src_original: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 何等名為轉輪聖王馬寶具足？

src_original: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartinaḥ aśvo bhavati sarvanīlaḥ kṛṣṇaśirā manojño javano 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸比丘！ 是轉輪王日初分時，坐正殿上，即於王前，出紺馬寶，名婆羅訶隋言長毛，色青體潤，毛尾悅澤，頭黑騣披，有神通力，騰空而行。

src_original: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñaś cakravartinaś cittam abhiprasīdati /  bhadrakaṃ vatāśvaratnaṃ sakṛd damatham eṣyatīti /  atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātam aśvadamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedam avocat* /
tgt_original: 時，轉輪王見馬寶已，作如是念：

src_original: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātam aśvaratnaṃ kṣipram eva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākam upanayitavyam iti /  evaṃ deveti saṃkhyāto 'śvadamako rājñaś cakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇair upasaṃkrāmati /  tadekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 『此馬雖現，未知調時堪受諸事，可得為我作善乘不？

src_original: tadyathānye aśvā anekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānāḥ sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti /  evam eva tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /  dāntaṃ cainaṃ viditvā rājñaś cakravartina upanāmayati /
tgt_original: 』是時，馬寶一日之中即善調伏堪受諸事，猶如餘馬無量千歲極調熟已，賢善閑習。 如是如是，調此馬時，一日之內堪任受行一切諸事，亦復如是。

src_original: dāntaṃ deva bhadram aśvaratnaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate /  atha rājā cakravartī aśvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tad
tgt_original: 時，轉輪王欲試馬故，於其晨朝日初出時，乘此馬寶，周歷大地，還至本宮，轉輪聖王乃始進食。
